quotes.quote: You have to be fast on your feet and adaptive or else a strategy is useless.
Move fast. Speed is one of your main advantages over large competitors.
Moving fast is not the same as going somewhere.
Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds.
Speed is not always a constituent to great work, the process of creation should be given time and thought.
You don't burn out from going too fast. You burn out from going too slow and getting bored.
Speed will follow when the mechanism of the movements is more assured.
Everything goes by so fast that if you want to be a part of it, you need to go that fast. But because you go that fast, you don't lead the life you should lead.
Life moves fast. As much as you can learn from your history, you have to move forward.
Speed is inconsequential if you are headed in the wrong direction.
Speed is a great asset; but it's greater when it's combined with quickness - and there's a big difference.
If you go too fast you might not notice everything. On the other hand, you don't want to be late.
To fly as fast as thought, you must begin by knowing that you have already arrived.
Sometimes when you're going fast, your instincts can be very useful.
We must go fast, because the race is against time.
Fast learners win.
Because running fast is more fun than running slow.
Move fast and break things. Unless you are breaking stuff, you are not moving fast enough.
The question is not whether we are able to change but whether we are changing fast enough.
Things can change so fast on the internet.
